page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox insertrows method

argument.name: target
argument.description: The index or value in the list at which to insert the new rows. See *[link:A5.ListBox.getIndex]*.

argument.name: data
argument.description: Data to insert into the list.

page.description: Insert new data into the list.

discussion.p: This method can be used to insert rows into the current data. The rows will be inserted at the given index before order and filter operations are done. If the data cannot be inserted because of an invalid index, the rows will be appended to the current data.
